item.title: Added ALL SHIELDS from summer's end
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[size=20pt]Part 1 (only 1 shield):[/size]

From the new quest, here’s one of the shields (Scroll down to bottom of thread to get other shields!!!):

Download the models HERE and extract in models folder for your client.

INTS:

if(i == 9000) // ItemID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 8889; class8.anInt181 = 1670; class8.anInt190 = 336; class8.anInt198 = 64; class8.anInt204 = 97; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = 37; class8.anInt165 = 8888; class8.anInt200 = 8888; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Shield"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a shield.".getBytes(); }

Don’t forget to say add model 8888 and add model 8889.

[size=30pt]PART 2[/size]

Here are the rest of the shields as promised. Download the new shields HERE and extract the models into your model folder. Don’t forget to say add model # ingame.

Pics of new shields:

INTS

if(i == 9001) // ItemID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 8000; class8.anInt181 = 1670; class8.anInt190 = 336; class8.anInt198 = 64; class8.anInt204 = 97; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = 37; class8.anInt165 = 9000; class8.anInt200 = 9000; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Shield 2"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a shield.".getBytes(); } if(i == 9002) // ItemID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 8001; class8.anInt181 = 1670; class8.anInt190 = 336; class8.anInt198 = 64; class8.anInt204 = 97; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = 37; class8.anInt165 = 9001; class8.anInt200 = 9001; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Shield 3"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a shield.".getBytes(); } if(i == 9003) // ItemID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 8002; class8.anInt181 = 1670; class8.anInt190 = 336; class8.anInt198 = 64; class8.anInt204 = 97; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = 37; class8.anInt165 = 9002; class8.anInt200 = 9002; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Shield 4"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a shield.".getBytes(); } if(i == 9004) // ItemID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 8003; class8.anInt181 = 1670; class8.anInt190 = 336; class8.anInt198 = 64; class8.anInt204 = 97; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = 37; class8.anInt165 = 9003; class8.anInt200 = 9003; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Shield 5"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a shield.".getBytes(); } if(i == 9005) // ItemID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 8004; class8.anInt181 = 1670; class8.anInt190 = 336; class8.anInt198 = 64; class8.anInt204 = 97; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = 37; class8.anInt165 = 9004;
